column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I ate too much here.  It's a tapas restaurant
column2: so a friend pretty much ordered half the menu items on the menu for all of us to sample.  We ordered a pitcher of the sangria
column4: order it!  We ordered beef empanadas
column8: and chicken empanada.  My top favorites were the bacon wrapped dates
column9: beef empanadas and deviled egg.  They were just enough to sample
column10: and the sangria was pretty tasty. I will have to try to paella next time I'm in town
column11: it looked fantastic at the table next to us.  No pictures because my phone had died.
